title: How to Make a Secret Base in Minecraft

steps.title: Find a spot that's empty where you'll be able to dig down.
steps.content: Find a spot that's empty where you'll be able to dig down. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Dig a 3x3x3 hole for the redstone device.
steps.content: Dig a 3x3x3 hole for the redstone device. It will serve as an entrance.

steps.title: Make the redstone device.
steps.content: Make the redstone device. Put 2 blocks in the middle and a raised block to the back and a block to the right. Place a redstone torch to the right, redstone dust under the raised block, redstone comparator, detector rail and a minecart with hopper in the rail. Place the sticky piston on the top of the torch. Cover the redstone and pistons using dirt blocks. [2] X Research source [3] X Research source To open the entrance, throw an item on the block near the hopper. To close it, collect the item.

steps.title: Dig down another five blocks and put the ladder from the ground to the redstone entrance.
steps.content: Dig down another five blocks and put the ladder from the ground to the redstone entrance.

steps.title: At the end of the pathway, dig a 9x6x3 room for the base.
steps.content: At the end of the pathway, dig a 9x6x3 room for the base.

steps.title: Put a quartz pillar at the corner and a door at the front.
steps.content: Put a quartz pillar at the corner and a door at the front.

steps.title: Make the ceiling.
steps.content: Make the ceiling. Put 2 quartz slabs around the quartz pillars. In the gap put a sea lantern with wooden trapdoors.

steps.title: Replace the stone walls with gray concrete.
steps.content: Replace the stone walls with gray concrete.

steps.title: Make the first room.
steps.content: Make the first room. Connect the quartz pillar and place a black bed in the middle. Surround it with quartz slabs.

steps.title: Make one left side and one right side rooms.
steps.content: Make one left side and one right side rooms.

steps.title: Place the double chests in the left side room.
steps.content: Place the double chests in the left side room. This will be the storage room.

steps.title: Place a furnace, ender chest, brewing stand in the right side room.
steps.content: Place a furnace, ender chest, brewing stand in the right side room. Put 2 crafting tables under it. This will be the crafting room.

steps.title: That's it for the basics!
steps.content: That's it for the basics! Keep building as you'd like to make the base your own.
